text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

- Symposium on "globalisation of economy and the Mediterranean countries" started on Monday. In a speech read on his behalf by Prime Minister Hamed Karoui, President Ben Ali calls for a peaceful and stable Mediterranean.
- President Ben Ali on Monday inaugurated the new Tunis Institute of Technology. French Education Minister Francois Bayrou, whose country financed the project, attended.
